item.title: Implementation of Ski Locomotion in Virtual Reality.
item.description: In my locomotion project I went for an approach to imitate cross-country-skiing in VR. The overall idea will be, that you have to move your arms from top to down, and this then gives you a push. Image Credits - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WaMTbWNVRko In the first part of my implementation, when playing with the given locomotion technique, I realized, that I can enter the ground.
